properties.description: The version of the runtime engine for the environment.

properties.description: The type of instance underlying the environment.

properties.name: PreferredMaintenanceWindow
properties.description: Configures a desired maintenance window for the environment. If you do not provide a value, a random system-generated value will be assigned.

properties.name: PubliclyAccessible
properties.description: Specifies whether the environment is publicly accessible.

properties.description: The list of security groups for the VPC associated with this environment.

properties.description: The storage configurations defined for the runtime environment.
